text:
Hi Camilla, 
Sorry for the delayed reply, I asked my mum to take my phone off me so I can revise. 
Sadly, I haven’t done anything exciting this week — it went by too fast actually :(

Thank you so much :blush:! I need to make sure I stay on track with my art work as well as my other subjects now, I keep leaving it aside as it’s the most time consuming and since you mentioned setting goals I think that it’d be a great idea (I’ll be reminded of my responsibilities)

The UCAS personal statement deadline is on the 15th of January so I would like to finish my personal statement before the year ends. So far I’ve only managed to write my introduction because most of my subjects aren’t straightforwardly linked to architecture so it’s a little difficult. I haven’t got any work experience so I think I could spare some time in my Christmas holidays to do some and maybe add that to my personal statement too?
